website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight luggage with designs that stand out from the crowd, and a special 8-wheel feature for maneuverability.
pros: Flashy and functional designer name set comes in 4 unique color patterns
No problem spotting these in baggage claim
Shell made of durable, protective ABS with polycarbonate film
Unique 8-spinner-wheel feature makes this luggage glide easily
Handle conveniently telescopes with push of a button
top/side handles allow for easy transport

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Thought I already posted that this stuff made it through an outbound and inbound trip perfectly. The wheels are really excellent, across sidewalk and trolly tracks. However, Please don't buy it. I want to be the only one with this design so it continues to be very easy to find. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Scotty 63

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful luggage. But used it only twice and the handle is broken. For the price, extremely poor construction. Do not recommend you waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: This luggage is absolutely gorgeous and looks exactly like the picture Inside has a zipper side to hold things separately. Great items for the money
customer_reviews.author: K.H

customer_reviews.title: Extremely poor quality. Lasted 2 trips.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas gift. My daughter has used it to travel on 2 domestic trips. Zippers already breaking. I am very disappointed in the poor quality. Bag unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Gilmer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed...Bought for my daughter as a college graduation gift. She took a two week trip to Europe and mid way the zipper broke. On the first time using it.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: This luggage is very attractive and different so it stands ...
customer_reviews.text: This luggage is very attractive and different so it stands out from other bags! The spinning motion is exceptionally smooth on all sorts of surfaces! The set arrived quickly and I have gotten rid of my first generation spinner luggage now because they are too heavy. This set is light but strong!
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Good Luggage but High Maintenance
customer_reviews.text: This luggage will require cleaning with a magic sponge and zipper repair, however the spinning wheels are really great and the color stands out! Expect this luggage to not look pristine once baggage handlers get their hands on it. I hoped the zippers would be able to withstand its first trip, unfortunately they did not. A zipper tab broke off. The warranty on the luggage states the 10-year limited warranty guarantee does not cover damage by a common carrier. Well I'm sure that pretty much covers anything that might go wrong with the luggage. It would be nice if Steve Madden sold replacement parts.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Disapointed
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and easy to maneuver however was disappointed that the construction material was flimsy and not very strong. When i open the suitcase it buckles in on its self. Hope it lasts more then 4 trips on an airplane. Still gave it 3 stars for great depth and easy mobility to move through airport.
customer_reviews.author: Dale LaPre

customer_reviews.title: I really liked the pop of the colors and the zippers being ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this luggage set for my girlfriend's birthday. I was rather impressed in person. I really liked the pop of the colors and the zippers being silver. It gave good contrast to the black handles. Very impressive to my girlfriend on her birthday!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey E. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love! It’s perfect and rolls so beautifully...I can’t wait to use it! I’ll update once I do!
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Best Luggage Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, durable, eye pleasing design, and the spin wheels makes it a breeze to move through airports! Great value and trusted name. Best luggage ever!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, lightweight and Durable!
customer_reviews.text: There’s not a con for me to add. However; many pros! The set is perfect. The picture does it no justice! Very lightweight but sturdy. I ordered for my daughter who’s in college. It’s perfect for her. Very stylish and durable. It survived her flight back to school. I was pretty hesitant of how it would handle baggage handling. But it handled it very well. Love this set! Think I’m going to order a set for myself! Also there’s several different zip compartments to store things. Not sure if that’s what it’s for, but it worked for us! BONUS!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE!!!! I’ve only used them once, but I love these suitcases! The wheels spin in every direction, making it easy to move them around. Different looking, so I can easily spot them. Holds a LOT. They are light weighted, I went on a 10 day trip (so packed a lot) and was still under weight. The only negative, they got pretty scuffed up...but their still cute.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and beautiful luggage
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and the design. I used the biggest size last month for an international travel, and I was really amaze that it didn't have any major damage other than scratches. It's quiet flimsy luggage but it's fine when you load it with your stuff. The wheels are also great and very helpful to me and my daughter. I even have a porcelain items inside the luggage wrapped in a bubble wrap, and I got it safe and sound without any damage. I have 19 hours flight and two luggage transfer international flight (one way only) multiply by 2.
customer_reviews.author: Llebreknit

customer_reviews.title: ... one plane ride thus far and it held up beautifully. The suitcases look very nice
customer_reviews.text: I've taken the middle-sized suitcase on one plane ride thus far and it held up beautifully. The suitcases look very nice, can fit a lot, and are sturdy despite being lightweight. I did a lot of research before purchasing the suitcases I did, and do not regret my choice.
customer_reviews.author: Calli

customer_reviews.title: Glossy texture, very cute !
customer_reviews.text: This luggage set was exactly what I was looking for! I love how bright and colorful it is. This will make it easy for me to spot my luggage at baggage claim. It has a glossy finish and it’s the perfect size with inside compartments. I love this luggage !
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: now it is super sharp and dangerous
customer_reviews.text: First time I used it the metal plate on the front was tore off.. now it is super sharp and dangerous! Such an expensive set to tear apart so easy
customer_reviews.author: Devin Dean

customer_reviews.title: Unique, beautiful, and appropriate for any age
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 9 year old granddaughter who has to travel a lot for competitive dance. She was so excited. The colors are gorgeous and the design good for the younger set to an adult. She will be able to use for many years
customer_reviews.author: Carol F.

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke after 6 uses
customer_reviews.text: I used this luggage a total of 6 times. The zipper broke on the smaller one. I had to cut the zipper in order to open it. This was always a carry-on. It was never checked at baggage. It was never miss handled by airport personnel. I guess that’s what I get for purchasing something that was manufactured in China.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Have used the smaller 2 several times now and the larger one once. Holding up well. Scuffed but no damage. All wheels and handles still intact.
customer_reviews.author: GordieM

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful luggage set!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this set to my daughter for Christmas. They look even better that in the picture! They arrived before expected too!
customer_reviews.author: LPD

customer_reviews.title: No way to contact for waranty
customer_reviews.text: Just at the year mark I grabbed my bag for another trip. The inside zipper is broken on the medium case. I have tried multiple ways to contact the company that handles the warranty and it seems that it is impossible. Only had it for a year. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Burri

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set of luggage. It is sturdy and rolls very smoothly. Carrie helped me and I could not be happier. I would definitely recommend this luggage to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased this brand of luggage before and the only complaint I have is that the Steve Madden logo comes off but over all an excellent product for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Obadiah N Salas

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This luggage is perfect! Great color and easy to spot at the luggage carousel at the airport. I took it on its first trip from coast to coast and it held up well. A few minor scratches, which is to be expected. This is my second hard-sided luggage set, I would highly recommend. Plenty of room and the 4 wheels are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Sunflower

customer_reviews.title: Stands out and fits alot of clothing (or whatever you want to travel with)
customer_reviews.text: Wanted luggage that would stand out at baggage claim and they sure did! Very spacious and love the spinning wheels! Only thing, our larger luggage broke the 1st time it was used. The handle on the side went missing and out poked sharp screws that could hurt someone. Sadly, had to cover with ugly duct tape...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of luggage
customer_reviews.text: These are very pretty! But after one trip by ground, they all have white scuff marks from bumping against each other. I’m not going to complain much because the we’re a cheaper price than most other sets this size.
customer_reviews.author: Trauma nurse

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Love these suitcase. They are very sturdy and they look great. I was easily able to spot my luggage on the carousel without having to attach something to the top and I received a lot of compliments about them too. Love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Beck

customer_reviews.title: Very colorful and pretty. However inconvenient as it does not have outside ...
customer_reviews.text: the 360 wheels. Very colorful and pretty. However inconvenient as it does not have outside pockets. Also hard to clean all the oil off of the pieces from the conveyer belts.
customer_reviews.author: helen revier

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Luggage
customer_reviews.text: I took it on a trip shortly after purchasing and I can say I look forward to traveling with this luggage again. It's sturdy, roomy, stylish and the wheels make walking with it a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Best luggage I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This is really good luggage. The zipper works very smoothly and the wheels go over bumps, and even onto elevators, with no problems at all. This is the best luggage I've ever owned and the price was very reasonable. I would definitely buy Steve Madden luggage again.
customer_reviews.author: LR in Missouri

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived today! It looks so amazing in person! I’m traveling soon so will get to use them then. But this set is going to be easy to pick out at the airport! That and the luggage tags I ordered will definitely set them for me!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Pointer

customer_reviews.title: Travel with a personality
customer_reviews.text: These have been used for a mission trip, weekends away and my daughter’s constant packing for her house sitting she does. They are durable lightweight and super fun.
customer_reviews.author: cburger

customer_reviews.title: Great set - good for all kinds of travel
customer_reviews.text: I had needed a new suitcase set for years and was so excited to come across these. I'm so happy to have spinners now! The hard casing is good for air travel so nothing happens to your belongings. The only thing missing would be a matching, smaller toiletry bag, but other than that, I'm very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Siegel Lee

customer_reviews.title: Quality Luggage
customer_reviews.text: Great luggage - well-made and so colorful that no one will pick up your bags by mistake! I was a little hesitant to purchase luggage made by a shoe manufacturer, but these bags are solid!
customer_reviews.author: Edward G. Burley

customer_reviews.title: Just received it, am trvelling so will test durability.
customer_reviews.text: Very light and thin so skeptical about durability. Hope I am wrong! Looks beautiful and has almost no weight. Should be good!
customer_reviews.author: Meena

customer_reviews.title: Envy of the travelers
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful luggage set. It arrived as described and I’ll be taking it on holiday with me tomorrow! I purchased a set of TSA locks and they completed the set. I have taken them on a trip to Los Cabos Mexico and everyone continued to complement this luggage set. I recommended them at least 20 times on this vacation. They really are amazing and so pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Eleysium

customer_reviews.title: Love it - what other designs should I buy?
customer_reviews.text: Extremely light and well made. Very smooth wheels. Aesthetically pleasing even with scuff marks from airplane travel.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous and there's no way you won't see this luggage coming off the plane! Got so tired of checking tags to see if they were mine and now I won't have to...nothing else looks like this and you'd have a hard time finding any more attractive! Definitely for women only though!!!!😀
customer_reviews.author: Debby Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cases
customer_reviews.text: beautiful luggage. I purchased a single case while in Canada and was very excited to be able to complete the set here on Amazon. The pattern is very nice and they roll smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: airportbabe

customer_reviews.title: It looked great and will be easy to identify at baggage claim.
customer_reviews.text: The cases roll very easily and their unbelievably light weight. Since I just received them, I can’t address durability yet. But the inside looked great, well constructed. Packaged very well and carefully rapped.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Clark

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Been traveling with this product for about 2 years. I absolutely love it. I will order this product again. It is costly but worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: LaShanna Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Delivered as promised took on two plane trips so far and is not holding up very well. You do not have a problem spotting your bags at the baggage claim through
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: I literally love this set
customer_reviews.text: I literally love this set!!! It is so different then the other luggage cases when you are in the airport or traveling. The Colors are vibrant and Bold just like i like it.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Favorite luggage set ever !
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product!! Exactly as pictured, brand new and in flawless condition. Love the coloring and the attention to detail. Shipping was quick and nothing arrived damaged. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: lots of compliments
customer_reviews.text: love this. took them on a cruise. very durable and cute
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this pattern!!
customer_reviews.text: Love,Love, Love! Went to Niagra Falls from Missouri and back and fine. Little scuffs but to be expected. So many compliments! Love the spinner wheels! Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Jewell N.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful and unique that’s what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I loved the fact it had a 10 year warranty and that it came with bag tags for all three suitcases. Haven’t used it yet but I’m going to Jamaica in a week I’m so excited to use it can’t wait...
customer_reviews.author: Jimia Knight

customer_reviews.title: Even more beautiful in person
customer_reviews.text: Even more beautiful in person. Love my new luggage! Can't wait to use it. This is the fourth luggage set I've purchased and this is THE BEST hands down!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Do like them very much
customer_reviews.text: They were smaller that I thought. Do like them very much.
customer_reviews.author: Gayla B.

customer_reviews.title: Traveling in style! Love love love my luggage set!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this set! Light weight, spacious, great quality and very chic. Received many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Cyn

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, light, roller friendly... just right!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing 3 piece light weight. I was afraid to order but they were just what I was looking for. I’m glad I also bought the luggage protector covers because the zippers are completely white so very easy and quick to get dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Reesha

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love them!!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love!!! I cannot wait to use them!!! This is a great price for all three. The pattern is awesome and will make my bags easy to find!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far I love these; used for only one trip so far ...
customer_reviews.text: So far I love these; used for only one trip so far - but they rolled nice and are adorable.
customer_reviews.author: STP1492Blue

customer_reviews.title: these look really nice. a little thinner than I thought it would ...
customer_reviews.text: these look really nice. a little thinner than I thought it would be but for now still 5 stars. wow!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M.

customer_reviews.title: Just like the picture in love with those
customer_reviews.text: AMAZINGGG!!!! Just like the picture in love with those! Good buy
customer_reviews.author: CLSB

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these. I've taken them on two flights already
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these. I've taken them on two flights already. Very durable and super easy to roll. They are great quality and not to mention fashionable!
customer_reviews.author: Yamma

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and is sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and the sturdiness . it is lightweight as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I had a small issues and I spoke to Carrie, and she handled very quickly within 30 minutes of my email!
customer_reviews.author: TLJ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful luggage
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful luggage. Good quality. Looking forward to my next trip so I can use it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy luggage to be so light weight.
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and roll of this luggage. I am hoping that it will last because after 1 long trip, it is scratched a bit.
customer_reviews.author: sheilaweetly

customer_reviews.title: Travel in style!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift. Loved by recipient! Great color for hard covered luggage. Spinner wheels are the bonus feature.
customer_reviews.author: Believer!

customer_reviews.title: You see me rollin'!
customer_reviews.text: Mom loves how easy it is at the airport now!
customer_reviews.author: JRocka

customer_reviews.title: Great Luggage
customer_reviews.text: We have used the set. It is sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: I like it! I like it! I like it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter said " I like it! I like it! I like it! It's epic. I can't wait to use them on your next trip. "
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hamby

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Pretty luggage set, it came in good condition but it scratches up easy tooo easily and the zippers seem a little feeble.
customer_reviews.author: Nicoya Boothe

customer_reviews.title: I work for an airline and travel a lot this ...
customer_reviews.text: I work for an airline and travel a lot this has to be the cutest luggage I have ever owned and very durable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift and she absolutely loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Peeple Jr

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and durable luggage. Recently took It to Miami . Easy pick out at baggage claim because of colors

customer_reviews.title: Great luggage set
customer_reviews.text: Great luggage set. Looks as pictured, rolls smoothly and easily. Very happy with the set.

customer_reviews.title: Nice luggage!
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far! Very durable, good price and light.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Duran

customer_reviews.title: It came in excellent condition and got to me in a good amount ...
customer_reviews.text: Very excited to use my luggage for college. It came in excellent condition and got to me in a good amount of time
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: but looks just like the pictures do online
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t use on a trip yet, but looks just like the pictures do online!! Everyone thinks there so cute! LOVE!!
customer_reviews.author: Maverick Tyler Livingston

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Broke in just 1 use. Dented and zipper ripped off in multiple places. Greatly disappointed! :(
customer_reviews.author: Kaif Gilani

customer_reviews.title: AMAzing
customer_reviews.text: Yes I love it!!! Great quality. It's so cute in person.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I used these once and only on a cruise. The zipper was difficult to work and the wheels wouldn't spin. It was so hard I had to carry it most of the time. It popped open once according to the cruise line. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Laura McAdams

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Returned it - the flimsy quality is not what I expected. :o(
customer_reviews.author: Grandpa

customer_reviews.title: light weight and great quality! Cannot wait to use it for all ...
customer_reviews.text: The luggage is gorgeous, light weight and great quality! Cannot wait to use it for all my trips!
customer_reviews.author: Kati Kalemba

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Adorable. Didnt keep however as she picked some others before this order came had to send back.
customer_reviews.author: Anovi

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: This is the best luggage I have owned. It worked great. Just got back from a cruise. Received several comments on the luggage from bystanders. Very durable and I had no problems with the wheels or damage to the case(s).
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Classy Luggage
customer_reviews.text: I have not tested the luggages for handling and durability during the flight. I will be able to do so after my 11 day trip in May and August. I am rating the items now based on appearance. I know that I will be able to spot the luggages on the carousel with no problem. The design and colors are exactly what I was looking for. If one wants classy looking luggages, I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Loved them!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these at the last minute when my old suitcase came out of the garage damaged. I was leery of the hardcase & color but my husband lobbied strongly for them. He was right - we loved them. Very durable, very versatile. We're going to buy a 2nd set!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. J

customer_reviews.title: Love Them!!
customer_reviews.text: This is really like a 4.5 stars. Didn't want to give it a 4 though. The reason I say 4.5 is because there is NO ZIPPERS on the inside. That is a big thing in suitcases for me but as pretty and durable these are it's not a deal breaker. They are even prettier in person.
customer_reviews.author: LadyBoss

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING but color looks different
customer_reviews.text: I love it. The zipper is strong I dont know what others are talking about. The color is a little different from what you see in pictures but i love it nevertheless. Its good quality and love the tag it comes with. Good job Steve Madden. This is a great product!!
customer_reviews.author: season6

product_meta.title: Steve Madden Luggage Collection - 3 Piece Hardside Lightweight Spinner Suitcase Set - Travel Set includes 20 Inch Carry On, 24 inch and 28 Inch Checked Suitcases (Diamond)
feature_bullets: ✈️ BUILT FOR TRAVEL; Travel lighter than ever with this luggage; The lightweight construction helps you adhere to airline weight restrictions and avoid unneeded airport fees which make it best suitcase for domestic and international travel

✈️ PUSH-BUTTON HANDLE; All STEVE MADDEN suitcases are equipped with a multi stage retractable trolley system, which is designed for everybody height. Thanks to the trolley system, it is easy and comfortable to pull and to maneuver the luggage. After arriving at your destination, you can retract the entire telescopic handle into the suitcase

✈️ BUILT FOR COMFORT AND CONVENIENCE; You can easily drag along the airport with its ergonomic handle providing easy maneuverability and relieve any pressure from your arms while on the move; The 8-spinner wheels system allow smooth, 360° degree movement over any rough terrain for complete mobility free-weight rolling

✈️ DELICATE DESIGN; The stylish unique style, noble and elegant design, catering to the new trend of fashion. No matter travelling on the weekends or go abroad, you will be the distinctive one. Suitcase lining made of high quality and safe polyester fabric; PERFECT GIFTS; Beloved, friends, parents, daughter, girlfriend, Christmas, saint valentine, birthday, anniversary, mother's day, new year, Thanksgiving etc
✈️ SATISFACTION GUARANTEED; Limited 5 year manufacturer warranty plus trusted companion promise, which covers the cost of repair for damage for any manufacturer defect or replace the defective bag

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars132 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
